title: Spicy tofu salad bowl
ingredients: ['3 spring onions, sliced', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds', '1 1/2 teaspoons Korean chilli pepper powder, or to taste', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon toasted Asian sesame oil', '240g steamed Japanese rice', '1/2 head of romaine lettuce (heart only), torn into bite-size pieces', '1/2 cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped', '340g tofu, sliced']
